concept.title: Enabling SSL
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the RPC origin to enable the secure transfer of data with SSL. To enable SSL, you need a keystore with the private keys of the SSL certificate and the associated password.

conbody.p:
RPC originsenabling HTTPSTo enable security:
Save the keystore file in the resources directory: <SDCinstalldir>/resources.
In the RPC origin, enter the filename and password.
